ygData.subject: Re: [shadowknight] Bronze
ygData.msgSnippet: Man, unrest is prime hunting for a SK, and there are drybones strewed about the place. Please not has been least 6 months since ive been, there, and armor
ygData.messageBody:
Man, unrest is prime hunting for a SK, and there are drybones strewed about
the place. Please not has been least 6 months since ive been, there, and
armor drops may have changed. But, Dry bones are anywhere in the house, and
they used to drop small bronze...
----- Original Message -----
From: "(Lasombra Shadowfiend)" <vtemplarv@...>
To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
Sent: Friday, March 03, 2000 12:36 PM
Subject: RE: [shadowknight] Bronze


> From: "(Lasombra Shadowfiend)" <vtemplarv@...>
>
> Is there a specific area of Unrest, ie. the courtyard, which room in the
> Mansion? I have been in Unrest for about 10 minutes and never made it into
> the house. I was 23rd at the time. Thanks.
>
> --
> Lasombra
>
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: Steven E. Phipps [mailto:phipps@...]
> Sent: Friday, March 03, 2000 10:23 AM
> To: shadowknight@onelist.com
> Subject: Re: [shadowknight] Bronze
>
>
> From: "Steven E. Phipps" <phipps@...>
>
> Back in the day, small bronze was found in unrest on drybones. thats where
> we first got ours, and large bronze from the ogre captain in najena...
> ----- Original Message -----
> From: "(Lasombra Shadowfiend)" <vtemplarv@...>
> To: <shadowknight@onelist.com>
> Sent: Friday, March 03, 2000 12:29 PM
> Subject: [shadowknight] Bronze
>
>
> > From: "(Lasombra Shadowfiend)" <vtemplarv@...>
> >
> > I am bored at work, so bear with me please. :-)
> >
> > What is the best place to find Small Bronze? I have heard Drybones in
> > Lakerathetear by SK, and Unrest by not a specific mob. Would anyone here
> > please point me in a specific direction? The DB in LRathe are camped
24/7
> > and I'd care to not get in line on a MoB that gives me no xp. Thanks.
> >
> > --
